mapper.select: select * FROM t_usage us JOIN t_user u ON u.user_cd = us.user_cd WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND YEAR(gas_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(gas_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(elec_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(elec_time) = MONTH(CURDATE())

SELECT u.user_cd AS userCD, u.user_nm AS userNM, g.type AS usageType, g.charge AS unitCharge, gas_usage, gas_time FROM t_user u JOIN t_usage us ON u.user_cd = us.user_cd JOIN t_gas g ON us.gas_cd = g.gas_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id})

SELECT u.user_cd AS userCD, u.user_nm AS userNM, e.type AS usageType, e.charge AS unitCharge, elec_usage, elec_time FROM t_user u JOIN t_usage us ON u.user_cd = us.user_cd JOIN t_elec e ON us.elec_cd = e.elec_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y'AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id})
